text: exposing the secret hacks to supercharge your Urban Garden let's dive into the top urban farming hacks for high yield first up container gardening use deep wide containers to give Roots room to grow next companion planting peir plants like tomatoes and basil they help each other Thrive don't forget vertical farming utilize walls and fences for climbing plants saves space and boosts yield water smart use drip irrigation it's efficient and reduces Water waste mulch mulch mulch it keeps soil moist and weeds at Bay got pests try natural Predators like ladybugs safe and effective and finally keep planting Cycles going rotate crops to keep soil healthy and productive that's it happy farming for more tips hit that like button and subscribe
